subtitle: Spiced turkey served in tortillas.

method.text: Cut each apple slice in half lengthways. Put in bowl and coat with lime juice.

Heat oil in a large frying pan. Add onion and cook over high heat for 2 min. Add garlic, chillies, spices and turkey. Fry, stirring, for about 5 min until turkey is golden. Lift turkey out of pan and set aside.
Add apple and water to pan and cook with onions for 3 min. Return turkey to pan and cook for 5 min until apples are tender but still hold their shape. Season. Add coriander.
Meanwhile, heat tortillas as directed on pack.
To serve, place 2 heaped tablespoons of the filling in each tortilla, roll up and eat straight away.

title: Turkey and apple fajitas
